summary: Created page with "{{Stub}}  '''Lord Monckton''' is a climate change denialist and [[InfoWars]] guest.  Monckton is actually a hereditary peer, however he has never been a member of the House of Lords. He has, at various times, claimed to be a member, based on a dubious claim that the House of Lords Act 1999 is unconstitutional. In 2011, the real House of Lords sent him a cease and desist letter<ref>https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2011/jul/18/climate-monckton-member-house-lords</ref>."
